clock7.question: Find at what time between 8 and 9 o'clock will the hands of a clock being the same straight line but not together.
At what time between 5 and 6 'o' clock are the hands of a clock 3min apart?
The minute hand of a clock overtakes the hour hand at intervals of 65minutes of the correct time.How much a day does the clock gain or lose?
A watch which gains uniformly,is 6min.slow at 8 'o' clock in the morning Sunday and it is 6min.48sec.fast at 8p.m. on following Sunday.When was it correct?
A clock is set right at 6a.m. The clock loses 16minutes in 24hours.What will be the true time when the clock indicates 10p.m. on 4th day?
